TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WordBagEstimator extends Microsoft.ML.Data.TrainedWrapperEstimatorBase
Public NotInheritable Class WordBagEstimator Inherits TrainedWrapperEstimatorBase

Docs.summary: Produces a bag of counts of ngrams (sequences of consecutive words) in a given text. It does so by building a dictionary of ngrams and using the id in the dictionary as the index in the bag.
